toggleValue: The value to set when toggling word wrap on. This value will be directly applied to `editor.wordWrap`.
toggleValue.on: Lines will wrap at viewport width.
toggleValue.bounded: Lines will wrap at the minimum of viewport and `editor.wordWrapColumn`.
configurationTarget: Target for updating the word wrap setting.
configurationTarget.workspaceFirst: Trys to update the workspace setting, but updates the global setting if no workspace is open.
